documentation.text:
@notice Calculate the reward that can be claimed from the last received time to the present time.
 @return A number representing the reclamable ALI tokens. Result is scaled by 1e18.

attributes.text:
@notice Calculate the reward that can be claimed from the last received time to the present time.
 @return A number representing the reclamable ALI tokens. Result is scaled by 1e18.

params.periodIndex: The period index. The period index must be between [0, maxiumPeriodIndex]

returns._0: A number representing the block number of the milestone at the beginning of the period.
A number representing the reclamable ALI tokens. Result is scaled by 1e18.

params.blockNumber: The block number. The block number must be >= startBlock

returns._0: A number representing period index of the input block number.

params.periodIndex: The period index. The period index must be between [0, maxiumPeriodIndex]

returns._0: A number representing the reward token per block at specific period. Result is scaled by 1e18.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getBlockNumberOfMilestone(uint256).notice: Calculate the block number corresponding to each milestone at the beginning of each period.

getClaimableReward(uint256).notice: Calculate the reward that can be claimed from the last received time to the present time.

getPeriodIndexByBlockNumber(uint256).notice: Determine the period corresponding to any block number.

getRewardPerBlock(uint256).notice: Caculate the reward per block at the period: (keepPercent / 100) ** period * initialRewardPerBlock
